# Basic statistics 
 
## max_operator  {-}

Description: `max` operator returns the max of a set of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/max_operator 
 
## upperandlowerbounds_operator  {-}

Description: `upperandlowerbounds` operator computes an upper and lower bound values as a fraction of a given data point. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/upperandlowerbounds_operator 
 
## median_operator  {-}

Description: `Median` operator returns the median of a set of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/median_operator 
 
## percentile_operator  {-}

Description: `percentile` operator returns the percentile of a set of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/percentile_operator 
 
## sd_operator  {-}

Description: `sd` operator computes the standard deviation of a set of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/sd_operator 
 
## cv_operator  {-}

Description: `cv` operator calculates the coefficient of variance on a set of input values. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/cv_operator 
 
## pearson_operator  {-}

Description: `pearson` operator performs a person correlation of two input sets of data per cell 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/pearson_operator 
 
## sum_operator  {-}

Description: `sum` operator computes the sum of a set of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/sum_operator 
 
## count_operator  {-}

Description: `count` operator counts the number of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/count_operator 
 
## IQR_operator  {-}

Description: The `IQR` operator returns the interquartile range of a set of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/IQR_operator 
 
## mean_operator  {-}

Description: `mean` operator computes the mean of a set of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/mean_operator 
 
## mean_sd_operator  {-}

Description: `mean sd` operator computes the mean and standard deviation of a set of data points. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/mean_sd_operator
